_field_real.name: biped speed reference:wu/s#for bipeds, the speed at which you are on the far right of the 'speed to max camo' graph
active camo ground vertical speed scalar#0 means no vertical speed is used for active camo reduction, and 1 means it is fully used while on the ground
active camo airborne vertical speed scalar#0 means no vertical speed is used for active camo reduction, and 1 means it is fully used while airborne
vehicle speed reference:wu/s#for vehicles, the speed at which you are on the far right of the 'speed to max camo' graph

_field_real_fraction.name: camo value for game name#minimum active camo percentage at which a player's game name will start becoming visible

_field_struct.name: camo value to transparency#maps active-camo percentage to alpha for THIRD PERSON rendering
camo value to fp transparency#maps active-camo percentage to alpha for FIRST PERSON rendering

_field_real.name: camo depth bias max distance#This is used to deal with ugly rendering artifacts when camo is not fully on

_field_struct.name: camo depth bias function#This is used to deal with ugly rendering artifacts when camo is not fully on

_field_real.name: grenade throw penalty:0..1!*#reduces camo value by this much when throwing a grenade
melee penalty:0..1!*#reduces camo by this much when meleeing
minimum dinged value!*#when taking damage or doing other actions that reduce camo, we will never drop below this value
interpolation time:s!*#time it takes to interpolate from 0.0 to 1.0

_field_block_64.name: shield boost
_field_block_64._field_explanation: This feature was implemented for the engineer character in atlas. Shield dynamics overrides for when shields are being 'boosted' by an external source

_field_real.name: shield boost decay#amount of shield-boost to decay per second
shield boost recharge time#time to recharge full shields when getting boosted
shield boost stun time#stun time when getting boosted
